root.name: Starshatter
root.description: OverviewStarshatter is a space combat game developed by Destroyer Studios and published by Matrix Games. A remake, Starshatter: The Gathering Storm was released in 2006 and has since gone open source.System RequirementsMinimumPentium II 400 MHz128 MB RAM100 MB Available Disk SpaceTNT-2 3D Accelerator or betterWindows 98 or betterDirectX 7 or betterMouse and KeyboardRecommendedPentium III 700 MHz256 MB RAM100 MB Available Disk SpaceGeForce 2 Accelerator or betterWindows 98 or betterDirectX 7 or betterMouse and Keyboard
